Policy Clarification

Are meal interruptions fully prohibited?

No. Intake remains authorized when executed inside continuity corridors and registered in the district log.

How long does federal attestation take?

Most entities receive a provisional stamp in 72 hours and full certification within 10 business days.

Can state agencies join multi-site plans?

Yes. National Grid coverage supports mixed municipal, state, and contractor operations in one command dashboard.
